name: Acid Trip
description:
Welcome to Acid Trip!


ACID TRIP is a 2d top-down shooter you can play it with raw brutality, hard-boiled gunplay, and skull-crushing close combat and defeat bosses, zombies, and don't die from shredders, traps to make it more hellish and brutal. it's like if doom was 2d.


KILL, destroy, fuck up zombies. Oh, and look good to your friends by smashing their scores on the leaderboards.

STORY:

You’ve come here for a reason. they are to friends working on new year eve so one of them put acid in candy 🍬 and they took it without knowing so they took an overdose and the hungover started the game take place in their mind tripping and making them imagine they are in a zombie apocalypse and If they die in there mind they die in the real world.

KEY FEATURES:

  • Back-Breaking , Challenging Gameplay

  • purchase Perks and upgrades to Kill, destroy, fuck up zombies more brutality!!!
  • Endless Possibilities and a variety of powerups

  • Fast-paced gameplay that will make the bones in your hands shatter!!!

  • Leaderboards to prove you're better than the rest of the world, or at least your friends!

  • Dodge, shoot, and destroy 8 challenging multi-form bosses

  • Intense sound design with gurgling zombies and all that shit!

  • Intense Musical Accompaniment
